00095 class EGS_SHAPE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_ShapeCollection : public EGS_BaseShape {
00096 
00097 public:
00098 
00099     EGS_ShapeCollection(const vector<EGS_BaseShape *> &Shapes,
00100                         const vector<EGS_Float> &Probs, const string &Name="",
00101                         EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00102     ~EGS_ShapeCollection() {
00103         if (nshape > 0) {
00104             for (int j=0; j<nshape; j++) {
00105                 EGS_Object::deleteObject(shapes[j]);
00106             }
00107             delete [] shapes;
00108             delete table;
00109         }
00110     };
00111     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00112         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00113         return shapes[j]->getPoint(rndm);
00114     };
00115 
00116     bool supportsDirectionMethod() const {
00117         for (int j=0; j<nshape; j++) {
00118             if (!shapes[j]->supportsDirectionMethod()) {
00119                 return false;
00120             }
00121         }
00122         return true;
00123     };
00124 
00125     EGS_Float area() const {
00126         EGS_Float A = 0;
00127         for (int j=0; j<nshape; j++) {
00128             A += shapes[j]->area();
00129         }
00130         return A;
00131     };
00132 
00133     void getPointSourceDirection(const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00134                                  EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00135         EGS_Vector xo = T ? Xo*(*T) : Xo;
00136         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00137         shapes[j]->getPointSourceDirection(xo,rndm,u,wt);
00138         if (T) {
00139             T->rotate(u);
00140         }
00141     };
00142 
00143 protected:
00144 
00145     int            nshape;
00146     EGS_BaseShape  **shapes;
00147     EGS_AliasTable *table;
00148 
00149 };
00150 
00151 #endif
